snippet: Three German car parts suppliers have been told by China they can no longer manage their Chinese units independently but need to form partnerships with local peers, the chief executive of auto parts maker ElringKlinger told a German paper....

headline.print_headline: German Car Parts Suppliers Asked to Form JVs in China-Stuttgarter Zeitung
headline.main: German Car Parts Suppliers Asked to Form JVs in China-Stuttgarter Zeitung

lead_paragraph: Three German car parts suppliers have been told by China they can no longer manage their Chinese units independently but need to form partnerships with local peers, the chief executive of auto parts maker ElringKlinger told a German paper.
